article: My name is Brad. I'm _ Sichuan. I'm a(n) _ monkey and I am only one year old. I like eating _ and bananas are my favorites. I like forests ,but now I live in a _ . I am in a big cage  _ other monkeys. People like me and often give me some fruit to eat. _ I'm not really happy. _ ? Because I can't live with my parents and I can't climb trees  here. Every day, I get up in the cage. I eat food in the cage. I sleep and relax in the cage. I really want to _ my parents and climb trees in the forests. Dear people, animals are your _ . We live in the same world. Please let us live in the forests, not in the cages.
